程序包 net.minecraftforge.fml.common.network

类 ByteBufUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraftforge.fml.common.network.ByteBufUtils
  • public class ByteBufUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for interacting with ByteBuf.
    作者:
    cpw

    • 方法详细资料

      • varIntByteCount

        public static int varIntByteCount​(int toCount)
        The number of bytes to write the supplied int using the 7 bit varint encoding.
        参数:
        toCount - The number to analyse
        返回:
        The number of bytes it will take to write it (maximum of 5)

      • readVarInt

        public static int readVarInt​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf,
                             int maxSize)
        Read a varint from the supplied buffer.
        参数:
        buf - The buffer to read from
        maxSize - The maximum length of bytes to read
        返回:
        The integer

      • readVarShort

        public static int readVarShort​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf)
        An extended length short. Used by custom payload packets to extend size.
        参数:
        buf -
        返回:

      • writeVarShort

        public static void writeVarShort​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buf,
                                 int toWrite)

      • writeVarInt

        public static void writeVarInt​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf to,
                               int toWrite,
                               int maxSize)
        Write an integer to the buffer using variable length encoding. The maxSize constrains how many bytes (and therefore the maximum number) that will be written.
        参数:
        to - The buffer to write to
        toWrite - The integer to write
        maxSize - The maximum number of bytes to use

      • readUTF8String

        public static java.lang.String readUTF8String​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf from)
        Read a UTF8 string from the byte buffer. It is encoded as []
        参数:
        from - The buffer to read from
        返回:
        The string

      • writeUTF8String

        public static void writeUTF8String​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf to,
                                   java.lang.String string)
        Write a String with UTF8 byte encoding to the buffer. It is encoded as []
        参数:
        to - the buffer to write to
        string - The string to write

      • writeItemStack

        public static void writeItemStack​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf to,
                                  net.minecraft.item.ItemStack stack)
        Write an ItemStack using minecraft compatible encoding.
        参数:
        to - The buffer to write to
        stack - The itemstack to write

      • readItemStack

        public static net.minecraft.item.ItemStack readItemStack​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf from)
        Read an ItemStack from the byte buffer provided. It uses the minecraft encoding.
        参数:
        from - The buffer to read from
        返回:
        The itemstack read

      • writeTag

        public static void writeTag​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf to,
                            net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound tag)
        Write an NBTTagCompound to the byte buffer. It uses the minecraft encoding.
        参数:
        to - The buffer to write to
        tag - The tag to write

      • readTag

        @Nullable
public static net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound readTag​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf from)
        Read an NBTTagCompound from the byte buffer. It uses the minecraft encoding.
        参数:
        from - The buffer to read from
        返回:
        The read tag

      • writeRegistryEntry

        public static <T extends IForgeRegistryEntry<T>> void writeRegistryEntry​(@Nonnull
                                                                         io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf out,
                                                                         @Nonnull
                                                                         T entry)
        Write a registry entry to the stream. The serialized format is not specified and must not be relied upon. Do not use this to write to a file, it is used for client-server communication only.
        参数:
        out - the buffer to write to
        entry - the registry entry

      • readRegistryEntry

        @Nonnull
public static <T extends IForgeRegistryEntry<T>> T readRegistryEntry​(@Nonnull
                                                                     io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf in,
                                                                     @Nonnull
                                                                     IForgeRegistry<T> registry)
        Read a registry entry from the stream. The same format as in writeRegistryEntry(ByteBuf, IForgeRegistryEntry) is used.
        参数:
        in - the buffer to read from
        registry - the registry the entry belongs to
        返回:
        the read registry entry

      • writeRegistryEntries

        public static <T extends IForgeRegistryEntry<T>> void writeRegistryEntries​(@Nonnull
                                                                           io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf out,
                                                                           @Nonnull
                                                                           java.util.Collection<T> entries)
        Write multiple registry entries from the same registry to the stream. The serialized format may be more compact than using writeRegistryEntry(ByteBuf, IForgeRegistryEntry) multiple times.
        参数:
        out - the buffer to write to
        entries - the entries to write

      • readRegistryEntries

        @Nonnull
public static <T extends IForgeRegistryEntry<T>> java.util.List<T> readRegistryEntries​(@Nonnull
                                                                                       io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf in,
                                                                                       @Nonnull
                                                                                       IForgeRegistry<T> registry)
        Read multiple registry entries from the same registries from the stream. The list of entries must have been written by writeRegistryEntries(ByteBuf, Collection).
        参数:
        in - the buffer to read from
        registry - the registry the entries belong to
        返回:
        the immutable list of entries

      • getContentDump

        public static java.lang.String getContentDump​(io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf buffer)
